sentences.sContent: I send all my income tax query to my accountant.
sentences.sContent_eng: I send all my income tax query to my accountant.
sentences.sCn: 我把所有有关所得税的疑问送交会计师。

sentences.sContent: Do you want me to invite your accountant to this meeting?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do you want me to invite your accountant to this meeting?
sentences.sCn: 你想让我把你的会计师也邀请到会议里么？

sentences.sContent: We need an accountant to help from the accounts and tax aspect.
sentences.sContent_eng: We need an accountant to help from the accounts and tax aspect.
sentences.sCn: 我们需要一位会计师从账目和税的角度来帮忙。

phrases.pCn: 总会计师；会计主任，会计处长
注册会计师；会计师；特许会计师
注册会计师；审定会计师
初级会计师；助理会计员

remMethod.val: account(账目)+ant(…的人)→管账目的人→会计

words.tran: 会计工作；会计学；会计师之职

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to keep and check financial accounts, calculate taxes etc
